name: BREXIT 3
description:
The wait is finnaly over, the explosive end to keremy jyles journey, keremy jyle awakes in isabelles asylum and upon leaving come face to face with and old enemy but now they have to work together to destroy the israeli threat once and for all.

Explore and a deep and vast open world on your quest to destroy africa.

Download instructions - download the file then right click on it to extract it, once extracted open it and run double click on B3, then get ready for your life to change...
